content: s n a d i s w e a t e r tiniest sweater of them all p a t t e r n b y @ h i p p u s i a tag me on instagram @hippusia a b o u t t h e p a t t e r n this pattern is written for magic loop method but you can easily use dpn s too just divide stitches evenly on four needles and think of your first and second needle as needle 1 your third and fourth needles are then needle 2 you can use basically any yarn and needles for this miniature sweater size and yardage varies depending on your yarn measurements are calculated using fingering weight yarn raglan stitches are marked in red you can find abbreviations on page 4 y a r n 10 grams of regia premium yak 100 g = 400 m or any fingering weight yarn n e e d l e s 2 25 - 2 50 mm g a u g e 16 sts = 5 cm m e a s u r e m e n t s total height 9 cm bust circumference 14 cm sleeve lenght from necline 9 cm h a p p y k n i t t i n g i n s t r u c t i o n s co 24 sts the bor is now under the arm divide sts in half on needle 1 and and the needle changes on the 2 join in the round being careful opposite armpit not to twist the stitches there is 24 sts on both needles ribbing and 20 sts on both scrap yarns row 1 - 3 *k1 p1* body raglan increases row 21 knit place stitch markers and make repeat row 21 for fourteen times increases every 2nd round as more or until desired length follows hem row 4 k2 m1r pm k1 m1l k6 m1r row 36 - 39 *k1 p1* pm k1 m1l k2 repeat on needle 2 row 5 knit bind off sts row 6 *k to m m1r sm k1 m1l* repeat *-* once more k to end of needle repeat on needle 2 row 7 knit repeat row 6 and 7 six times more 88 sts in total sleeve 10 sts 1 raglan st front 22 sts 1 raglan st sleeve 10 sts on both needles separate sleeves and body this row is a bit different as the sleeve sts are divided on needles 1 and 2 follow carefully raglan sts will stay on needles as we continue to body row 20 k to first m sm k1 k to second m remove marker k1 slip 10 sts on a scrap yarn continue to needle 2 slip 10 more sts on the same scrap yarn remove marker k1 k to next m remove marker k1 slip last 10 sts of the round on another scrap make a super cute surprise for yarn
